<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:2013812315f425107f44775c1b035a3f=Yes^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="Expense Request ">1f2045df1574e1107f44775c1b035a01</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
    g_form.setSectionDisplay('What amount your are requesting for accommodations?', false);
}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
    g_form.setSectionDisplay('What amount your are requesting for accommodations?', true);
    g_form.setMandatory('What amount your are requesting for accommodations?', true);
}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Hide/Show and make mandatory the option field for hotel price</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>yaimara.narito</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-11 19:54:42</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>66ea07c81581e5107f44775c1b035adc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hide/Show and make mandatory the option field for hotel price</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="PayNow" source="x_cdltd_paynow">6d4e264315b8a1107f44775c1b035a06</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PayNow">6d4e264315b8a1107f44775c1b035a06</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_66ea07c81581e5107f44775c1b035adc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>yaimara.narito</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-11 20:03:34</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
